name: Extend Commmunications
description:
We provide unique and individual solutions for telephone answering, email response, and web interaction. If you need daytime telephone reception, after hours emergency dispatch, or if you're launching a marketing campaign and need support to handle large call volumes, we're the company you're looking for! For 50 years we have been designing customized programs to serve businesses large and small and everything in between.
We will integrate all methods of communication and develop a specialized plan to make today's technology work for you. Extend Communications is leading edge in Ontario call centre technology. We provide inbound call centre and telephone answering services as well as emergency dispatch contracts to various corporate clients across Ontario and throughout other regions of Canada and the USA. Our call centre operations are based in Brantford Ontario, an hours drive west of Toronto, and we do not sub contract or operate offshore telephone answering services. Our well trained and accredited staff ensure a seamless interface between the customer and your company. Extend Communications has the added advantage of being able to provide turnkey call centre services and integrated communications with the most up to date technology available to business and consumer operations.
